column5: So I got a bunch of work done to my boat finally.. I went to do an update to the thread but I cant find it anywhere..Were a bunch of things deleted, or am I just not seeing how to access them?That thread had a lot of very valuable information in it..Please help me find it.

Should be able to do it, maybe try a search with keywords rather than scrolling back, just recently there have been threads brought back to life on Iceland and another on an outpost camp from 2007 and 2008, suggesting it can be done.
Cant find it even in the search.. it comes back with no results found..I have to be doing something wrong..
Nothing is deleted we keep them all for legal reasons. With the right search word it will appear.   Art
I found it the hard way..I even searched for my posts and nothing came up..Thanks for the help
